description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4fcpu","text":"The purpose of this protocol is to determine successful polymerase chain reaction (PCR) amplification. This is achieved by preparing PCR sample and ladder droplets, preparing the E-Gel‱ Power Snap, depositing all samples into appropriate lanes on an E-gel of the E-gel, and viewing the results on the E-Gel‱ Power Snap Camera. This will result in an image of a gel, that has a ladder that can be compared to the desired PCR samples. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":184,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":306,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"E39AD2AF4AC611EFB1CF0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"10661B114AC711EF85B70A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b8sds","text":"Choose an appropriate E-Gel Agarose cassette with SYBR stain, and the appropriate agarose percentage. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d9it","text":"          a.      DO NOT OPEN CASSETTE PACKAGE (at this point)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djhnn","text":"          b.     At EFGL there are at least two options, a single comb (11 lanes) or a double comb (22 lanes).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asvp9","text":"                  The single comb is NOT obviously marked. If you are uncertain, with the package closed, you ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ha59","text":"                  should be able to feel one lump (single comb) or two lumps (double comb) through the front ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"vdh0","text":"                  side of the package. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbk9j","text":"         c.      Choose which one is less wasteful based on how many samples you have, and the type of band    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5j8fp","text":"                  resolution you need. Remember, you will have to fill empty wells with water ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ontg","text":"         b.     These are in the cabinet below the E-Gel station","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

At EFGL, E-Gels are used to confirm successful PCR amplification","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"em6q3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3m8q5","text":"Prepare working space","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edp4f","text":"          a.     Secure Parafilm wax paper to bench top with tape","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e4feb","text":"Prepare the E-Gel‱ Power Snap","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a1r0e","text":"WARNING – This machine uses UV that will damage your eyes if you don’t use the protective orange screen as intended.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7},{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":116}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1o1s","text":"          a.      There are two parts to the E-Gel‱ Power Snap                                  \n                     i.     The E-Gel‱ Power Snap, which is where you will insert the cassette and has the orange   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":50,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":134,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b3odm","text":"                            UV protective screen.  \n                     ii.     E-Gel‱ Power Snap Camera, which detaches from the machine. It is used to view the                                           ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fd9pt","text":"                             gel progress and take images.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"03EF92F84AC411EFB1CF0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"03EF92F84AC411EFB1CF0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"2":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"03EF92F84AC411EFB1CF0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}},"3":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"03EF92F84AC411EFB1CF0A58A9FEAC02","name":":tm:"}}}}

Insert your flash drive to make sure it syncs with the machine. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cpet","text":"          c.      TURN OFF THE MACHINE, by flipping the switch at the back again. {"blocks":[{"key":"3iufk","text":"Prepare Sample(s) for E-gels","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cear0","text":"          a.      On the wax paper, aliquot out 18 µL of water for the ladder and each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qcl6","text":"          b.     Dispense 2 µL of the ladder into the first 18 µL water droplet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mu2n","text":"          c.      Dispense 2 µL PCR product into the corresponding 18 µL water droplets                 \n                    i.     Use a new tip every time                       \n                    ii.     Each droplet should only have a total volume of 20µL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"243jm","text":"     Unwrap the E-Gel ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dkfkh","text":"Remove the comb protector by popping it off from the edges of the cassette","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"523b8","text":"Check the cassette for irregularities.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnkgb","text":"          a.      Clean the cassette face with a Kim wipe if you splashed any liquid when removing the comb  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32dnv","text":"                   protector","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"121mg","text":"          b.     The gel should be clear and transparent","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ddpt7","text":"Moving quickly, use the single channel pipette set to 20 µL to transfer samples to their respective wells ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4njoa","text":"          a.      Careful not to overfill the wells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69r1m","text":"          b.     Careful not to pierce the gel walls","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efd7r","text":"          c.      Use a new tip every time","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bs20h","text":"Load the cassette onto the machine","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8r3d","text":"          a.      MACHINE OFF","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rvnv","text":"          b.     Lift off the camera ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qer9","text":"          c.     Open the orange protective screen, by pressing the white latch release button under the ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1jte","text":"                  warning symbol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4g0tr","text":"          d.     With the comb openings facing up, lower the right-hand side of the cassette into the\n                  machine first. Then press the left-hand side down until it clicks into place. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5g2n0","text":" In empty wells, add 20 µL of water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3t74p","text":"          a.      Use a new tip every time","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1bqu2","text":" When the gel is loaded, snap the lid close and turn ON the machine. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44j1c","text":"Select the appropriate E-Gel program. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffj6d","text":"          a.      Based on the agarose%, single/double comb, and stain","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"40e4d","text":"Begin the run.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dajeb","text":"Place the camera back onto the machine","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7b0fn","text":"Capture and export images to a flash drive throughout the gel run.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"39j4m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8png5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"as09s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"alt":"","guid":"B87CDEFE4AC511EFB1CF0A58A9FEAC02","height":309,"id":487787,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Presentation1.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/q5kub353x.png","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/q6mmb353x.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/q6mkb353x.webp","width":550}}}}
